languages.text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор, похоже, сегодня благодушен. Его лицо расслабленно, а спокойный взгляд не сулит никому немедленных и суровых кар.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор, похоже, сегодня благодушен. Его лицо расслаблено, а спокойный взгляд не сулит никому немедленных и суровых кар.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor appears to be in amiable temper today. His expression is relaxed, and his calm gaze does not bode any immediate or harsh punishment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор, похоже, сегодня благодушен. Его лицо расслабленно, а спокойный взгляд не сулит никому немедленных и суровых кар.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor appears to be in an amiable disposition today. His expression is relaxed, and his calm gaze does not bode any immediate and harsh punishment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}今日のロード・インクィジターは穏やかな様子だ。表情はくつろいでおり、穏やかな視線からはただちに厳しい罰が与えられるとは考えにくい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor appears to be in amiable temper today. His expression is relaxed, and his calm gaze does not bode any immediate or harsh punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}今日のロード・インクィジターは穏やかな様子だ。表情はくつろいでおり、穏やかな視線からはただちに厳しい罰が与えられるとは考えにくい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}大审判官此刻看起来很和蔼。他表情闲适，目光平静，这意味着他暂时并不打算实施严厉的惩罚。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor appears to be in amiable temper today. His expression is relaxed, and his calm gaze does not bode any immediate or harsh punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长此刻看起来很和蔼。他表情闲适，目光平静，这意味着他暂时并不打算实施严厉的惩罚。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor parece estar de buen humor hoy. Su gesto es relajado y su tranquila mirada no parece augurar castigos inmediatos ni severos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor appears to be in amiable temper today. His expression is relaxed, and his calm gaze does not bode any immediate or harsh punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor parece estar de buen humor hoy. Su gesto es relajado y su tranquila mirada no parece augurar castigos inmediatos ni severos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur semble être d'humeur affable, aujourd'hui. Son visage détendu et son regard apaisant ne laissent présager aucun châtiment immédiat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor appears to be in amiable temper today. His expression is relaxed, and his calm gaze does not bode any immediate or harsh punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur semble être d'humeur affable, aujourd'hui. Son visage détendu et son regard apaisant ne laissent présager aucun châtiment immédiat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Großinquisitor scheint heute gute Laune zu haben. Sein Gesichtsausdruck ist entspannt, und sein ruhiger Blick lässt nicht auf plötzliche oder harsche Strafen schließen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor appears to be in amiable temper today. His expression is relaxed, and his calm gaze does not bode any immediate or harsh punishment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Großinquisitor scheint heute gute Laune zu haben. Sein Gesichtsausdruck ist entspannt, und sein ruhiger Blick lässt nicht auf plötzliche oder harsche Strafen schließen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu, bugün epey cana yakın bir gününde gibi duruyor. Yüz ifadesi rahat, sakin bakışları da kimse için ani veya sert bir cezaya alamet değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor appears to be in amiable temper today. His expression is relaxed, and his calm gaze does not bode any immediate or harsh punishment.{/n}
